n=0;

new graph 1 {0,0};
/*
0
*/



	
n=1; 

new graph 7 {0,2} {0,3} {1,3} {1,4} {2,5} {3,5} {3,6} {4,6}; 
/*	
  2
0	5
  3
1   6
  4
*/


n=2; 

new graph 12 {0,2} {0,3} {1,3} {1,4} {2,5} {3,5}
 {3,6} {4,6} {5,7} {5,8} {6,8} {6,9} {7,10} {8,10} {8,11} {9,11}; 
/*	
  2   7
0	5   10
  3   8
1   6   11
  4   9
  */
n=3 ;
new graph 17 {0,2} {0,3} {1,3} {1,4} {2,5} {3,5} {3,6} {4,6} {5,7} {5,8} {6,8} {6,9} {7,10} {8,10} {8,11} {9,11} {10,12} {10,13} {11,13} {11,14} {12,15} {13,15} {13,16} {14,16};
/*	
  2   7    12
0	5   10    15
  3   8    13
1   6   11    16
  4   9    14
*/  
n=4 
new graph 22 {0,2} {0,3} {1,3} {1,4} {2,5} {3,5} {3,6} {4,6} {5,7} {5,8} {6,8} {6,9} {7,10} {8,10} {8,11} {9,11} {10,12} {10,13} {11,13} {11,14} {12,15} {13,15} {13,16} {14,16} {15,17} {15,18} {16,18} {16,19} {17,20} {18,20} {18,21} {19,21}
/*
  2   7    12    17
0	5   10    15    20
  3   8    13    18
1   6   11    16    21
  4   9    14    19 */

n=5 ;
new graph 27 {0,2} {0,3} {1,3} {1,4} {2,5} {3,5} {3,6} {4,6} {5,7} 
{5,8} {6,8} {6,9} {7,10} {8,10} {8,11} {9,11} {10,12} 
{10,13} {11,13} {11,14} {12,15} {13,15} {13,16} {14,16} 
{15,17} {15,18} {16,18} {16,19} {17,20} {18,20} {18,21} 
{19,21} {20,22} {20,23} {21,23} {21,24} {22,25} {23,25}
 {23,26} {24,26};
/*
  2   7    12    17    22
0	5   10    15    20    25
  3   8    13    18    23
1   6   11    16    21    26
  4   9    14    19    24 */
